org.opends.server.backends.jeb

Class OrderingIndexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.backends.jeb.Indexer
      • org.opends.server.backends.jeb.OrderingIndexer

  • public class OrderingIndexer
extends Indexer
    An implementation of an Indexer for attribute ordering.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OrderingIndexer(AttributeType attributeType)
      Create a new attribute ordering indexer for the given index configuration.
